home_description: Track workouts, nutrition, and progress. Connect with a fitness community. Achieve your health goals with Wellio.
dashboard_description: View your fitness stats, track progress, and stay motivated with your personalized dashboard.
auth_description: Join Wellio to track your fitness journey, connect with others, and achieve your health goals.
workout_description: Log your exercises, track sets and reps, and monitor your fitness progress over time.
food_description: Track your meals, monitor calories, and maintain a balanced diet with our nutrition tools.
activity_description: Access all your fitness activities including workouts, weight tracking, habits, and more.
profile_description: Manage your fitness profile, view achievements, and customize your Wellio experience.
settings_description: Customize your Wellio experience with account settings, preferences, and privacy options.
feed_description: Connect with fitness enthusiasts, share your progress, and get inspired by others.
challenges_description: Join challenges, compete with friends, and push your limits to achieve new goals.
subscription_description: Unlock premium features and take your fitness journey to the next level with Wellio Pro.
rewards_description: Redeem your earned points for exclusive rewards, badges, and premium features.
referral_description: Invite friends to Wellio and earn bonus points for every successful referral.
search_description: Find users, posts, and trending topics in the Wellio fitness community.
messages_description: Chat with friends, trainers, and fellow fitness enthusiasts.
notifications_description: Stay updated on your fitness journey with alerts, reminders, and social updates.
not_found_description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Return to Wellio home.
